mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.overview AS "overview", a.content AS "content"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM iim_mail a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO iim_mail( id, title, overview, content ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{overview}, #{content} )
